messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Garden of Eating was: housekeeping, eating and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kathleen (and anyone interested)...I literally live within 2 miles of two of the locations listed for this book, and work right next to a third. I d be
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kathleen (and anyone interested)...I literally live within 2 miles of
two of the locations listed for this book, and work right next to a third.
I'd be happy to pick books up if there is some benefit to that over the
website (though I admit to not following this thread closely, just saw the
reference to Phoenix)...

Changing Hands bookstore in particular is an absolute treasure of a place
and I go there often...
Jacki
-----Original Message-----
From: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of Kathleen Whitfield
Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2007 10:02 AM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Garden of Eating was: housekeeping, eating
and unschooling


Thanks for the link! I'll be driving through Phoenix soon, and I buy
it at one of the local stores (if I can wait).

Kathleen

messages.messageBody:
That book sounds intriguing, but I checked it out on amazon and abebooks,
and the cheapest copies are selling for $50!

Kathleen Whitfield
